q: Secretary Eric Schmidt ? Eric Schmidt was an early backer of Barack Obama and according to NewsMeat, has given more than$ 230,000 in campaign donations to Democrats, compared with less than$ 20,000 to Republicans. There is a political favor to be returned yet, said Roger Kay, George W. Bush of Endpoint Technologies. Eric Schmidt 's fundraising ability would also be a pro for Team Barack Obama , which is going to need big money to finance the 2012 reelection campaign.

The prime minister said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " I believe it would be appropriate for the prime minister to come to the Commons to explain why this is happening and give the public the full details here in the House of Commons, rather than bury this news "`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' Sun Microsystems, has by far the most enterprise experience in the triumvirate that runs Google, which also includes co-founder Sergey Brin .`` Eric Schmidt clearly had passion for enterprise software,'' says Gartner analyst Whit Andrews. He cared about enterprise software. He worked at a lot of companies that sold enterprise software and bunch of enterprise products. That history is not in place with Larry Page . While Mr. David Cameron was quick to issue a statement supporting Mr. Andy Coulson Friday, arguing that his ex-aide has been punished twice for the same offence, the tabloid scandal has tainted his government with two less than desirable associations.
